emip_omi module¶

The emip_omi module provides classes for processing OMP data.

Class hierchy¶

The classes and are defined according to the following hierchy:

  • UtopyaBase

    • UtopyaRc

      • EmipTask

        • EmipOmiConvert

    • SatXFile

      • OmiExtract
